data.text:
In the field of a basketball game, Metta World Peace is a renowned name to be remembered. He is professionally a basketball coach and former player too. 38-years-old, Metta World Peace has already played for many teams and is famous as the defender champion. With no doubt, he is in one of the best and favorite basketball player In the American history.

Letâs take a look at Metta World Peace married life, children, divorce, affairs, girlfriend, wiki facts, career and his net worth in upcoming headings.

Metta World Peace on Coaching Knicks

Recently, on Friday December 6, 2019, the second year coach, David Fizdale who was coaching the New York Knicks was fired. While the team have been looking for a replacement, Metta World PEace thinks he would be better suited for the vacancy.

Metta World Peace took to his Twitter to reveal that he wanted to be the head coach for the Knicks. This post was later deleted!

Mettaâs dream to coach Knicks was short-lived as the team promoted the assistant coach, Mike Miller as the intermin coach for the time being.

Metta World Peace Married life; Divorced His Wife

Renowned basketball coach, Metta World Peace was once a married man. He was previously married to Kimsha Artest Hatfield but ended their marriage relationship with divorce.

Metta World Peace married his girlfriend, Kimsha Artest Hatfield in June 2003. At the time of his marriage, he was known as Ron Artest but legally changed his name to Metta World Peace in 2011. Metta World Peace together with his ex-wife has three children. Among them, two are daughters named Diamond Artest and Sadie, and another is a son named Ron Artest III.

Photo Credit: Zimbio

After six years of a marriage relationship, Metta World Peace decided to end his married life with Kimsha. He divorced his now ex-wife in 2009. Although they have already divorced, they share joint custody of their children. Metta World Peace also has another child from his high school girlfriend, named Jennifer Palma. Altogether Metta World Peace have four children. He loves his children very much.

Metta World Peace Dating Life; Girlfriend, and Affairs

Metta World Peace is currently dating a Korean-Canadian model, Maya Ford. His affair with Maya started in 2012 which later became viral in the media coverage. Metta World Peace is happy with his girlfriend Maya, as he loves her very much.

Caption: Metta World Peace with his girlfriend, Maya Ford.

The couple often shares their cute and romantic pictures via Instagram for their fans. They have not yet announced about getting married or their engagement till the date. As of now, they are enjoying their dating life as a girlfriend and boyfriend.

Metta World Peace Career

Metta World Peace started his career in 1999 NBA draft after selected by the Chicago Bulls in 1999 NBA draft. After then, he joined Indiana Pacers. Metta made the 2004 NBA All-Star Game as a reserve and was named the Defensive Player of the Year. He won an NBA championship in 2010 as a member of the Los Angeles Lakers. He has played basketball from many teams till 2017. On October 23, 2017, World Peace was hired as a player development coach by the South Bay Lakers, for the NBA G League.

Photo Credit: USA Today

Apart from basketball, Metta also created his reality show, They Call Me Crazy, in conjunction with E1 Entertainment and Tijuana Entertainment in 2010. In January 2018, Metta World Peace appeared in the first season of Big Brother: Celebrity Edition along with other 1o celebrities as houseguests. He is one of the exciting stars to watch on Big Brother: Celebrity Edition because he enjoys the game on his own and also doesnât care about the rule of the game.

Metta World Peace has sponsored several brands including k1x and BALLâN (sneakers). He is also the brand ambassador for a clothing company, The Pandas Friend. Besides that, on October 31, 2006, Metta released a rap album entitled My World.

Metta World Peace Wiki-Bio; Age, Height, Nationality, and Ethnicity

Metta World Peace was born as Ronald William Artest Jr on November 13, 1979, and grew up in the Queensbridge projects in Queens, New York. At present, his age is 38 years old.

Metta World Peace has a towering height of 6 feet 7 inch. He belongs to American nationality, and his ethnicity is black.

Regarding his family background, there is not much information disclosed till the date.

Metta World Peace Net worth and Social Media Profile

Metta World Peace was one of the highest paid players during his career as a player. He is active in professional basketball career since 1999. He has now become a coach too. Considering these facts, Metta World Peaceâs net worth must be pretty huge. As of 2018, Metta World Peaceâs net worth is estimated at $35 million.

Metta World Peace is active on social media site such as Instagram where he has more than 140 k fan followers. Similarly, in his Twitter account, more than 710k fan follows him. He shares his personal life and professional life to his fan via social media site.
